document_title: Otitis media with effusion: Causes, symptoms and treatment
subsection_name: viem-tai-giua-u-dich.json_1_Subjects susceptible to otitis media with effusion
subsection_content: Dr. Huong said that anyone can have fluid retention in the ear, but the risk of it occurring in children is higher. This is because a child's Eustachian tube is smaller and tends to lie more horizontally than an adult's ear.
subsection_title: viem tai giua u dich.json. Subjects susceptible to otitis media with effusion
subsection_data:
viem tai giua u dich.json. Subjects susceptible to otitis media with effusion
Dr. Huong said that anyone can have fluid retention in the ear, but the risk of it occurring in children is higher. This is because a child's Eustachian tube is smaller and tends to lie more horizontally than an adult's ear.
